entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late this evening then partly cloudy. Snow mixed with rain early this evening. Risk of freezing rain early this evening. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming west 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 26 January 2023
